text: Sergio Ciani (7 September 1935 â€“ 5 September 2015), best known as Alan Steel, was an Italian bodybuilder and actor. He was known for his roles in Samson, The Rebel Gladiators, and Hercules Against the Moon Men. Ciani died in his sleep at his house in Ostia, Rome, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian movie actors
title: Alan Steel
